name: Roll for Attack
description:
In this game, you play as a DM of a tabletop RPG campaign and you make your players fight against hordes of monsters that you control. Try to TPK the party!!!

CREDITS:

Art made by Amanda Oliveira Garcia

Code maded by Pedro M Marangon and Gabriel Armando Cegantini

Some sounds made by Pedro M Marangon, other ones were provided by Kenney
